title: The Final Last of Us Part II Previews Are Up - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.01.20
description:
Blessing is joined by Parris Lilly of GamerTag Radio to talk about the final The Last of Us Part II previews.

Time Stamps - 
 00:08:00 - Housekeeping
The PS5 Event is happening THIS THURSDAY. We’ll be reacting to it live right here on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames at 1 pm PT, with a post-show discussing everything revealed. Don’t miss it!
The great big Kinda Funny Core stream is also this Thursday! After the PS5 Reveal Event Post-Show, Manticore Games will join us on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames to announce the winners of the Kinda Funny Game Jam prizes! Andy and Greg will then hang out and play the winning games. Enter now at kindafunny.com/gamejam
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Conner Nolan, Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:09:30 - The Last of Us Part 2 final previews are up
00:20:40 - Xbox Series X IS on track for a worldwide launch this holiday - James Batchelor @ GiBiz
00:26:30 - Could we be getting Prey VR? - Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:31:07 - Pokemon Sword & Shield News is coming tomorrow - Joe Skrebels @ IGN
00:33:25 - Out today
00:36:30 -  Reader mail   -
00:37:30 - I’m curious as to whether you guys think Sony will/should push its PS5 event on Thursday - Patrick Higgins
00:42:13 - What do you think Nintendo’s major E3 style reveal for holiday 2020 is going to be?? - The Devmeister
00:48:30 - Squad Up: The Devmeister(Switch): SW-8247-7649-7098
00:48:55 - ONE OF THEM ROTATIN’ SEGMENTS
00:52:30 - You‘re Wrong
This week’s hosts:
Tuesday: Blessing & Kahlief Adams of Spawn on Me (who makes great ribs in the oven)
Wednesday: Gabe from Married to the Games
Thursday: The Commish and WWE Superstar Xavier Woods
Friday: Kahlief Adams is back to dig into the PS5 news!
